ValidationRule.description: Restrict user from updating status to Cancelled in UI , if Cancellation reasons are not populated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Cancelled'), ISCHANGED( Status ) , ISBLANK(TEXT( FSM_CancellationReason__c )),NOT( $Permission.FSM_Integration ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please populate Cancellation Reason if the status is Cancelled.
